trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that compares the value of an activity member to a specified value by using a specified comparison operator.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una condizione che confronta il valore di un membro di attività con un valore specificato utilizzando un operatore di confronto specificato.

trans-unit.source: You can use an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to constrain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> or an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: É possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> per vincolare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza il costruttore predefinito è necessario impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: You must also set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre necessario impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> è `Equals`.

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of an activity member.
trans-unit.target: Il nome delimitato da punti di un membro di attività.

trans-unit.source: The value to be compared
trans-unit.target: Valore da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class by specifying an activity member and a value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> specificando un membro di attività e un valore per il confronto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> is set to `member`, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is set to `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> è impostato su `member`, e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> su `value`.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> è `Equals`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity member that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del membro di attività da confrontare con <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the activity member
trans-unit.target: Il nome delimitato da punti del membro di attività.

trans-unit.source: You can specify an activity property or field, a member of an activity property or field, or a single element of an activity property or field (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare una proprietà o un campo delle attività, un membro di una proprietà o un campo delle attività oppure un singolo elemento di una proprietà o di un campo delle attività (o di un membro di entrambi) che implementa l'interfaccia <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a single element of a collection.
trans-unit.target: È ad esempio possibile specificare un solo elemento di una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza il costruttore predefinito per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, è necessario impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> in modo specifico.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified activity member is compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del membro di attività specificato viene confrontato con <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> applicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Member property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'accesso alla proprietà Member.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è tratto dall'esempio SDK Tracking Profile Designer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [esempio Tracking Profile Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: La condizione è stata valutata e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is incorrectly formed.
trans-unit.target: La condizione è stata valutata e il formato di <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> non è valido.

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> does not refer to a valid activity member.
trans-unit.target: La condizione è stata valutata e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> non si riferisce a un membro di attività valido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the operator that is used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l’operatore utilizzato nel confronto.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Equals" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="Equals" />.

trans-unit.source: Currently only supports `Equals` and `NotEquals`.
trans-unit.target: Attualmente supporta solo `Equals` e `NotEquals`.

trans-unit.source: The value that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore da confrontare con <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />.

trans-unit.source: The value used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Valore utilizzato nel confronto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is compared to the value of
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> viene confrontato con il valore di

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> applicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza il costruttore predefinito per <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, è necessario impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> in modo specifico.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Value property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'accesso alla proprietà Value.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio è tratto dall'esempio SDK Tracking Profile Designer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [esempio Tracking Profile Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
